scripts.build: cross-env NODE_ENV=production sst build --stage prod --profile predictive_insights
scripts.deploy: cross-env NODE_ENV=development sst deploy --stage matt --profile predictive_insights
scripts.deploy-prod: cross-env NODE_ENV=production sst deploy --stage prod --profile predictive_insights
scripts.dev: cross-env NODE_ENV=development sst dev --stage matt --profile predictive_insights
scripts.remove: cross-env NODE_ENV=development sst remove --stage matt --profile predictive_insights
scripts.remove-prod: cross-env NODE_ENV=production sst remove --stage prod --profile predictive_insights
